remarks: A function on the elements of an internal direct product has pairwise commuting values.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 11-Jul-2019.)
statement:
dprdff.w $e |- W = { h e. X_ i e. I ( S ` i ) | h finSupp .0. } $.
dprdff.1 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) $.
dprdff.2 $e |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) $.
dprdff.3 $e |- ( ph -> F e. W ) $.
dprdfcntz.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
dprdfcntz $p |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( Z ` ran F ) ) $.
$d .0. h $.
$d F h $.
$d I h i $.
$d S h i $.
